definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: roast, parch (NH [[קָלָה]] id. (rare), [[קָלִי]] = BH; As kalû II. I, III. I burn, consume Meissn:Suppl. 84; Sab. [[קלאתם]] conflagratio, aestus Os:4, Os:1, Os:19, Os:20 CIS:iv.No74, 1.20; Ar. qalay fry or roast wheat; Eth. qalawa qalaya burn, fry, so Targum [[קְלָא]] Syr qlo0);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[קָלָם בָּאֵשׁ]] Je 29:22 (acc. pers.) he roasted them with fire; Pt. pass. [[אָבִיב קָלוּי בָּאֵשׁ]] Le 2:14 (P) grain parched with fire; so [[קָלוּי]] alone, as common food, Jos 5:11 (P), v. [[קָלִי]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִקְלֶה]] as n. Ps 38:8 my loins are filled with burning (Vrss Bae with contempt, II. [[קלה]]).
